text: Nena, “Kodi ndani adaletsa kuvala zovala zoyenera zimene Mulungu adapatsa akapolo ake ndiponso zakudya zabwino?” Nena, “Zimenezo ndi zololedwa kwa anthu okhulupirira Mulungu pa moyo uno, ndipo zidzakhala zawo zokha pa tsiku la kuuka kwa akufa.” Mmenemo ndi mmene timaululira poyera chivumbulutso chathu kwa anthu ozindikira
